experience.title: Product Builder
accomplishments: Increased developer and sysadmin productivity by creating a public application that optimizes repetitive access patterns for atomic pieces of meaningful data.
Built and deployed all components from scratch including FE/BE, CI/CD, static code analysis, test coverage, IaC, containerized workflows, OAuth2 integration, and observability instrumentation.

experience.title: Owner
accomplishments: Ran a successful hardware/software consulting practice with broad industry execution in social media, financial services, risk management, agriculture, and healthcare.
Litigated pro se in a federal TTAB trial against a multibillion dollar corporate entity. Received a favorable settlement and garnered hundreds of educational hours studying trademark law.

experience.title: VP of Engineering
accomplishments: Advanced from a part-time contractor to leading an engineering team building a product used by Fortune 500 companies. Leadership spanned FE/BE, mobile, web and cloud.
Addressed attribute-level merge collisions for a distributed asynchronous write cache.
Coded abstract constructs to enforce a flexible multidimensional REST security model.

experience.title: IoT Engineer (Contract)
accomplishments: Wrote a sensor polling subsystem and web-based cluster manager for data aggregation through a hybrid microcontroller SBC fabric. Completed extensive TX/RX serial and I2C programming against INA219, BME280, MCP9808, SSD1306, VL53L0X, DS18B20, and other components.
Developed applicable knowledge of physical prototyping including 3D printing, materials selection, power subsystems, soldering/wiring, and thermal regulation.
Wrote a Nimbleink 4G LTE cellular connection manager and IP route governor for deterministic traffic flow across redundant uplinks.
Wrote an NMEA stream parser to assemble Exif data comprised of geolocated sensor output.
Implemented a serverless blur detection workflow to identify unprocessable image captures.
Built a web-based wpa_supplicant wrapper to facilitate user-configurable 802.11 parameters.
Wrote a hardware driver for a CDM7160 CO2 module.

experience.title: DevOps Engineer (Contract)
accomplishments: Completed extensive application performance profiling to identify bottlenecks and made changes to optimize hardware utilization and response times for deeply-nested/polymorphic data structures.
Automated code signing and release automation of iOS, Android, and Rails applications.

experience.title: Senior Systems Administrator
accomplishments: Greenfielded a multimillion dollar computing environment (NIST SP 800-53 compliant).
Implemented an HPC-integrated bioinformatics tool pipelining platform (Galaxy, Torque). Built an API integration to ensure POSIX ACL parity with web libraries.

Developed a customer-facing metered cloud billing system including client invoicing, mainframe transaction processing, roll-up reporting, subsidization tracking, and asset lifecycle initiation (Rails).
Wrote a provisioning tool for synchronizing IAM objects between Internet2 Grouper, Centrify DirectControl, and Isilon OneFS. Achieved global UID/GID to SID coherency.

experience.title: Security Engineer
accomplishments: Identified point in time ownership of L4 NAT sessions by designing a common information model, metadata abstraction schema, and correlation logic for billions of unstructured events (Splunk).
Authored a multi-user GnuPG wrapper to facilitate granular access control to encrypted files.
Performed Expect.pm automation against an IP network comprised of 2000+ programmable assets.
Implemented cross-platform PKI authenticated IPsec. Achieved proficiency in IKE debugging.
Deployed a vendor-neutral network ACL management and provisioning platform.

education.credential: Bachelor of Business Administration (Management Information Systems)
